title: Isaiah 20
content: Assyria will overrun Egypt and make her ashamed.

And the inhabitant of this isle shall say in that day, Behold, such
our expectation, whither we flee for help to be delivered from the king of Assyria: and how shall we escape?

People of Judah shall be dismayed by Assyria’s power, dispelling any hope of help from Egypt and Ethiopia.
